UPDATE submissions SET status=4 WHERE submission_id IN (SELECT e1.submission_id FROM edit_decisions e1 LEFT JOIN edit_decisions e2 ON (e2.submission_id = e1.submission_id AND e2.date_decided > e1.date_decided) WHERE e1.decision IN (4, 9) AND e2.edit_decision_id IS NULL) AND status=1
DELETE FROM submission_settings WHERE setting_name = 'crossref::status' AND setting_value IN ('submitted', 'failed', 'completed')
UPDATE submission_settings SET setting_value = 'registered' WHERE setting_name = 'crossref::status' AND setting_name = 'found'

INSERT INTO plugin_settings (plugin_name, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type, context_id) SELECT 'googlescholarplugin', 'enabled', '1', 'bool', j.journal_id FROM journals j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT ps.plugin_name FROM plugin_settings ps WHERE ps.plugin_name = 'googlescholarplugin' AND ps.context_id = j.journal_id)

INSERT INTO plugin_settings (plugin_name, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type, context_id) SELECT 'dublincoremetaplugin', 'enabled', '1', 'bool', j.journal_id FROM journals j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT ps.plugin_name FROM plugin_settings ps WHERE ps.plugin_name = 'dublincoremetaplugin' AND ps.context_id = j.journal_id)
